source:
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
The elderly miner is squinting at you with great intensity.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
トゥワインの年老いた労働者は、冒険者のことを勘違いしているようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINEROLD03495_000_000<tab>You there! New <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>! Where are the others?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINEROLD03495_000_000おう、おめえさん新人か？
他の連中は、どうした？

source: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINEROLD03495_000_001<tab>Don't try to play me for a fool, I know what they're up to. No good, that's what! Expect me to pay them for shirking their duties, do they? Bah!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINEROLD03495_000_001何をとぼけてやがる。
俺が老眼でよく見えねえからって、馬鹿にしてんのか！
集合予定の労働者が来てねえって言ってるんだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINEROLD03495_000_002<tab>Go and get them, will you? It's time I gave them a stern talking to!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINEROLD03495_000_002まったく、最近の若い連中はこれだから……。
お前、残りの3人を呼んできな！

source: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINEROLD03495_000_010<tab>The youth of today, what a shower of shite! In my day we had it tough. We'd be woken up half a bell before we'd went to bed, eat a handful of hot gravel, and─ What are you still gawping at me for, you bloody fool!?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINEROLD03495_000_010俺が若い頃は、もっとキビキビ動いたもんだが、
最近の若い連中は、どっか抜けてやがる……。
ほれ、残りの3人を集めてこい、新人！

source: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERA03495_000_020<tab>Ah gods, my aching head... I feel like death warmed up...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERA03495_000_020うう……昨日は飲みすぎたせいか、気持ちが悪い……。
そろそろ集合時間だってのに……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>It seems the man is suffering from a hangover. If you were to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>psych<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> him up, perhaps he might be more inclined to return to his duties.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_SYSTEM_000_021どうやら二日酔いのようだ……。
「しかめっ面の労働者」に「活を入れる」をして、
気持ちを整えてあげよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERA03495_000_030<tab>All right, all right! Enough of your posing!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERA03495_000_030お、おう、そうだな！
二日酔いで伸びてる場合じゃねえ。
しっかりと仕事をしねえと。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERA03495_000_031<tab>If going back to work's what it takes for you to leave me alone, so be it!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERA03495_000_031アンタが活を入れてくれたおかげで、
気持ちが悪いのもどっかへ吹っ飛んじまったよ。
ありがとな、旅人さん！

source: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERB03495_000_040<tab><sigh> Nothing's going my way... I haven't had a decent haul in ages. I might as well just hang up my pickaxe for good.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERB03495_000_040最近、いい鉱脈にめぐりあえてなくてさ……。
なんだか仕事に行くのも、憂鬱だよ。
はぁ～……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>The man seems to be lacking in motivation. Perhaps if you were to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>rally<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> his spirits, he might be willing to return to work.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_SYSTEM_000_041どうやら気持ちが落ち込んでいるようだ……。
「幸薄そうな労働者」に「励ます」をして、
気持ちを盛り上げてあげよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERB03495_000_050<tab>I don't know who you are or what you're doing, but your enthusiasm is somehow...infectious!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERB03495_000_050見ず知らずの人に励ましてもらえるなんて……！
その優しさが僕に力をくれるようだよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERB03495_000_051<tab>Yes, I should be thankful for what I have! I've got a steady job, a sort of beautiful home, what more could I ask for? Heigh ho, heigh ho, it's back to work I go!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERB03495_000_051ありがとう、旅人さん！
今度こそ、いい鉱脈を掘り当てて見せるよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERC03495_000_060<tab>Why would she leave me? There's nothing for her in Eulmore! Whatever will I do now?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERC03495_000_060ははは……妻がユールモアで一旗揚げるって、
家を出ていっちゃったんだよね……。
これからどうしようか……ははは……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_SYSTEM_000_061<tab>The man is clearly upset and in no fit state to work. If someone were to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>comfort<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> him, he might come to his senses.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_SYSTEM_000_061とても悲しんでいるようだ……。
「涙目の労働者」に「なぐさめる」をして、
気持ちを癒やしてあげよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERC03495_000_070<tab>“There, there?” What does that even mean, anyway? <var 1A 02 /var>There<var 1A 01 /var> are people who need me? <var 1A 02 /var>There<var 1A 01 /var> is still work to be done?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERC03495_000_070なぐさめてくれるのかい……。
ははは……世の中、そう捨てたもんじゃないのかもね……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERC03495_000_071<tab>That's it! I should forget my sorrows by burying myself in my work! Ah, a poor choice of words considering I'm a miner... But enough procrastinating, there's digging to be done!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERC03495_000_071よし、仕事だ！
仕事をして、吹っ切るぞ！
ありがとな、旅人さん！

source: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERA03495_000_080<tab>Nothing cures a hangover better than spending hours smashing rocks in a dingy mine... Ungh. Kill me now.
target: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERA03495_000_080<tab>二日酔いなんざ、仕事をして吹っ飛ばすぜ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERB03495_000_081<tab>Ha ha, those rocks won't know what hit them!
target: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERB03495_000_081<tab>今日こそいい鉱脈に出会える気がするよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERC03495_000_082<tab>Who needs her anyway? I'm married to my job!
target: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERC03495_000_082<tab>よし、空っぽの家のことなんて忘れて仕事だ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINEROLD03495_000_090<tab>So, the four of you finally decided to show up and do some bloody work, then?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINEROLD03495_000_090おう、全員呼んできたんだな、新人。
おつかれさん。
それじゃ、現場に向かうぞ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERA03495_000_091<tab>Four!? But this <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((bloke)) /var>'s not part of our team, is <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var>? As far as I can tell, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var>'s just passing through!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINERA03495_000_091ちょっとまってくれ、親方。
その人まで、現場に連れて行くのかい？
新人じゃなくて、旅人さんだぜ？

source: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINEROLD03495_000_092<tab>Eh!? What are you prattling about now?
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINEROLD03495_000_093<tab>Ha ha! My mistake! When you get to my age, one person-shaped blur looks much like all the others. Must be these damned eyes of mine.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINEROLD03495_000_093こ、こりゃすまねえ、旅人さん！
俺はてっきり新人の鉱山労働者だと思って……。
どうやら老眼のせいで見間違えたみてえだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINEROLD03495_000_094<tab>Still, we could use an extra pair of hands around here. I daresay you're worth more than all of these slack-jawed layabouts put together.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINEROLD03495_000_094しかし、残念だ。
アンタみたいにキビキビ動くやつが鉱山労働者じゃねえとは。
かなり見どころがあると思ったんだが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINEROLD03495_000_095<tab>But if you're not here for the mining, you might as well take this as payment for rounding up my workers. Gods help me, they're all I've got.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZG010_03495_MINEROLD03495_000_095勘違いしてすまなかったな。
それと、労働者を集めてくれてありがとよ！
駄賃代わりにコレを受け取ってくんな！
